The Intelligent Enterprise

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping industries and driving innovation. But the vast majority of businesses actually don’t get value from their data and AI projects. Understanding how to leverage its power is crucial for business leaders.

Get sample chapterBuy book

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping industries and driving innovation.

But the vast majority of businesses actually don’t get value from their data and AI projects. Understanding how to leverage its power is crucial for business leaders. The Intelligent Enterprise: An Executive's Guide to Realizing Value from AI and Datais your essential guide to creating and maximizing value from AI initiatives within your organization.

If you’re not already using AI effectively to enhance your business, be warned: there are likely a dozen startups out there that are implementing AI to disrupt you.

This book takes you on a journey through the evolving landscape of AI, offering clear insights into its potential and strategic applications. You’ll learn how to navigate the complexities of AI implementation, from setting clear objectives and aligning with business goals to creating a culture of continuous improvement and adaptation.

  • Identify Opportunities: Uncover the specific areas where AI can drive the most impact in your organization, enhancing efficiency and profitability.
  • Implement Effectively: Master the best practices for integrating AI solutions into your existing systems, ensuring seamless transitions that boost productivity without disrupting operations.
  • Lead Strategically: Empower your team with the knowledge and tools needed to thrive in an AI-driven landscape, enhancing collaboration and innovation across departments.
  • Measure Success: Establish metrics and feedback loops to assess the performance of your AI initiatives, allowing for agile adjustments that align with evolving business needs.

Whether you’re just starting your AI journey or looking to refine existing initiatives, The Intelligent Enterprise: An Executive's Guide to Realizing Value from AI and Dataequips you with the insights and strategies needed to drive sustainable growth and competitive advantage in today’s digital age. Embrace the future of business and unlock the true potential of your data with AI!

01Table of contents

Get a look at all of the content covered in the book. Everything you need to know is inside.

“Everything Starts as a Square” is comprised of 240 tightly edited, highly visual pages designed to teach you everything you need to know about icon design with no unnecessary filler.

  1. Getting started

    1. Getting started1
    2. Intro to Figma15
    3. Setting up your first artboard20

  2. Fundamentals

    1. Strokes and fills21
    2. End points22
    3. Bezier curves26
    4. Designing on a grid31
    5. Vector shapes45

02Screencasts

Over an hour of high quality, step-by-step video content to sharpen your AI workflow.

Learn how to design your very first AI use case in a series of screencasts that will teach you everything you need to know to go from beginner to pro in just over an hour.

  1. 16:54

    Getting started with artifical intelligence

    Get familiar with ChatGPT, the different tools it offers, and the most important features.

  2. 9:12

    Setting up your own model

    Learn how to create a new model and configure your weights and rules for ideal responsiveness.

  3. 23:25

    Designing your LLM

    Using basic coding and boolean operations, learn how to design your own LLM to rival ChatGPT and Gemini.

  4. 28:44

    Advanced design techniques

    Learn the techniques you need to know to adapt your LLM for enterprise use.

03Resources

Tools and resources you can use to get started even faster and progress even further.

Design assets, icon teardowns, and a community of fellow icon designers where you can ask questions, get feedback, and accelerate your learning.

  1. Figma designs for LLMs

    Perfectly structured templates for quickly designing new interfaces at dozens of common layouts.

  2. Weekly AI updates

    Weekly videos where we dissect and analyze AI news we find on the web.

  3. Community of like-minded professionals

    A private Discord server where you can get help and give feedback on each others' work.

05Author

Jason Goth – Hey there, I’m one of the authors behind ‘The Intelligent Enterprise’.

Jason Goth is the global Chief Technology Officer at Credera. With over 30 years of experience in technology consulting and software system design, he has led transformative projects for over two dozen Fortune 100 companies, such as American Airlines and Verizon. Jason is passionate about aligning technology with business goals to create impactful solutions. Outside work, he enjoys fishing and cherishes time spent with his wife, Leslie, their four children, and grandchildren.
